action.description: The event that occurred, such as a login attempt.

allowed.description: The result of the authentication event.

app_domain.description: The URL of the Access application.

app_uid.description: The unique identifier for the Access application.

ip_address.description: The IP address of the authenticating user.

ray_id.description: The unique identifier for the request to Cloudflare.

user_email.description: The email address of the authenticating user.
